faq.question: How do I create a new account?
faq.answer: Go to the university portal and click on 'Sign Up'. Fill in your personal details and submit the form.

faq.question: How do I log in to my account?
faq.answer: Visit the login page and enter your username and password.

faq.question: I forgot my password. How can I reset it?
faq.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions to reset your password.

faq.question: Where can I check my grades?
faq.answer: Log in to your account and navigate to the 'Grades' section.

faq.question: How can I register for courses?
faq.answer: Go to the 'Course Registration' section under the student dashboard and select your preferred courses.

faq.question: How do I drop a course?
faq.answer: In the 'Course Registration' section, select the course you wish to drop and confirm the action.

faq.question: How do I update my personal information?
faq.answer: Log in and go to the 'Profile' section to update your details.

faq.question: Where can I view my class schedule?
faq.answer: Navigate to the 'Class Schedule' tab on your dashboard.

faq.question: How do I pay my tuition fees?
faq.answer: Go to the 'Payments' section and select the 'Pay Fees' option. Follow the instructions to complete the payment.

faq.question: Can I download my transcript?
faq.answer: Yes, go to the 'Transcripts' section and click on 'Download'.

faq.question: Where can I find the academic calendar?
faq.answer: The academic calendar is available under the 'Resources' section.

faq.question: How do I contact my professor?
faq.answer: You can find contact details in the 'Faculty Directory' or message them through the portal.

faq.question: How do I submit assignments?
faq.answer: Go to the 'Assignments' tab, upload your file, and click 'Submit'.

faq.question: Where can I access library resources?
faq.answer: The 'Library' section on the portal provides access to all resources.

faq.question: How do I apply for graduation?
faq.answer: Navigate to 'Graduation Application' in your profile settings and submit the form.

faq.question: What should I do if I face technical issues?
faq.answer: Contact technical support via the 'Help Desk' link in the portal.

faq.question: How do I view announcements?
faq.answer: Announcements are listed in the 'Dashboard' section of the portal.

faq.question: Can I request a leave of absence?
faq.answer: Yes, go to 'Student Services' and submit a leave request form.

faq.question: Where can I find course materials?
faq.answer: Course materials are available in the 'Course Content' section for each course.

faq.question: How do I join online classes?
faq.answer: Log in and click on the 'Join Class' link under the class schedule.

faq.question: How do I update my emergency contact details?
faq.answer: Go to 'Profile Settings' and update the emergency contact information.

faq.question: Where can I find exam schedules?
faq.answer: Exam schedules are listed under the 'Exams' section in the portal.

faq.question: How do I request a recommendation letter?
faq.answer: Submit a request through the 'Requests' section under student services.

faq.question: How can I apply for scholarships?
faq.answer: Check the 'Scholarships' section and follow the application instructions.

faq.question: Where can I find internship opportunities?
faq.answer: Internship postings are listed under the 'Career Services' tab.

faq.question: Can I buy food at school?
faq.answer: Yes, from the mini shops in campus
